name: Gatecrash
description:
Gatecrash is a speedrunning fps platformer Try and clear the 10 levels as fast as possible! What is Gatecrash?

Gatecrash is a game I was working on a while back, and then scrapped. I've recently come back to it, patched it up a little and added more levels! The game now has 10 levels to play through, but the game should still only take 5-10 minutes to complete.

What's next?

Gatecrash isn't going to receive any major updates unless the game gets popular, but I'm currently working on my first 'Proper' game (Bar the dancer: definitive edition), which is called 'Voidside' (Search it up on youtube to find the devlogs). To help with the production of voidside, donations on this game or purchases of the dancer: definitive edition on steam are greatly appreciated! :D

(above is a voidside screenshot)

Have Fun! - Spacepiano :D
